tools.header: Access to Tools All in One Place

items.text: Interactive view of visual standards from colors, typography, icons, and imagery.
Common UI patterns that can be easily re-used across projects.
A responsive front-end framework, that is built on HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

benefit1.text: The common UX patterns and UI components included in Evolution can be re-used across projects.

benefit2.text: Projects built using Evolution deliver a common user experience and the ability to have a consistent UI across products.

benefit3.text: Evolution components are responsive out of the box, giving you default coverage for product delivery across multiple devices.

benefit4.text: Starting from a common baseline saves time across the facets of UI design; prototyping, visual design, & development.

benefit5.text: Project delivery is cheaper thanks to the re-use of components and patterns that have already been tested across browsers.
